E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Dave Burba
Dear Sir,
Dave Burba has an ERA of 2.76 at AA Reading Phillies!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Rick Wilkins
Dear Sir,

He has an AVG of .320, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
